thread.title: Fashion Meets Function in H&M Studio’s Sportswear-Inspired SS17 Collection
thread.title_full: Fashion Meets Function in H&M Studio’s Sportswear-Inspired SS17 Collection

author: Daniel Pearson
title: Fashion Meets Function in H&M Studio’s Sportswear-Inspired SS17 Collection
text:
Visit the original post to see all 11 images from this gallery. 
H&M Studio has released a teaser lookbook for its SS17 menswear collection, which will be shown for the very first time alongside its womenswear on the runway at Paris Fashion Week.
The collection sees fashion meet function on a range of pieces inspired by the delicate romance of ballet and the free-flowing adrenaline of sports — in other words, it’s athleisure. Premium materials like organic cotton, silk and leather are utilized in mostly monochrome colors, though there are sprinklings of color, as seen on the bright pink baseball-style jersey.
The collection will be available from March 2 only at H&M. Check out the lookbook above.
In other fashion news, here’s why you’ll be seeing a lot of Dior Homme’s “Mosh Pit” print next season.
